snippet: Mr. Lenzi won a gold medal in diving at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona, Spain, and four years later came out of a brief retirement to win the bronze medal at the Atlanta Olympics.
abstract: Marc Lenzi, American diving champion who won a gold medal at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona, Spain, and the bronze medal at the Atlanta Olympics in 1996, dies at age 43.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lenzi won a gold medal in diving at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona, Spain, and four years later came out of a brief retirement to win the bronze medal at the Atlanta Olympics.

headline.main: Mark Lenzi, Olympic Gold Medalist in Diving, Dies at 43
headline.print_headline: Mark Lenzi, 43, an Olympic Gold Medalist in Diving
